column1: Any further news about our deep concern to call on the Japanese side to stop dumping the
? But so far my likes and retweets have automatically disappeared many times.
We are all concerned about Japan nuclear water.

Liu Cixin once summed up human technology in two ways: if VR had matured earlier humans would have moved in the direction of more introverted Cyberpunk. If space technology matures first human civilization will develop in the direction of the stars the sea and the universe.
And many are also concerned about how the Chinese fascism treats the Uighurs. The original author of that Japanese wave painting Katsushika Hokasai would be concerned too if he is still alive today.
